subject: Legal action pending
body:
To TaskFlow Support,

This is to inform you that I am preparing to take legal action against your company for breach of contract and negligence. Your product has caused significant financial losses to my business.

I expect a full refund and compensation within 48 hours, or I will proceed with filing a lawsuit. I have already contacted my attorney and documented all issues.

You will be hearing from my lawyer soon.

Sincerely,
Legal Department
